sentences.en: a skirt with an elasticated waist
From her tiny waist a crinolined skirt cascaded in three deep tiers.
sentences.cn: 裙架撑起的三层大裥裙从她的纤腰上款款垂下。

sentences.en: Gather the skirt at the waist.
He tied the rope around his waist.
sentences.cn: 他把绳索系在自己的腰上。

sentences.en: His shoulders were broad and his waist narrow.
I'm about two inches larger round the waist.
sentences.cn: 我的腰围大概粗了两英寸。
杰克的双臂搂着她的腰。

sentences.en: One of them unwound a length of rope from around his waist.
sentences.cn: 其中一人把绑在腰间的一条绳子解下来。

sentences.en: Ricky kept his arm round her waist.
She chopped off her golden, waist-length hair.
sentences.cn: 她剪掉了她那齐腰的金发。

sentences.en: She had made Helen a dress which showed off her tiny waist.
sentences.cn: 她给海伦做了件很显她纤细腰身的连衣裙。

sentences.en: She wore a brown suede jacket, belted at the waist.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件带束腰的棕色绒面革夹克。

sentences.en: The dress exaggerates her wasp waist and enlarges her bosom.
sentences.cn: 那件连衣裙凸显了她的蜂腰，也让她的胸部看起来更丰满。

sentences.en: The grass in the yard was waist high.
The skirt was too big around the waist.
This skirt needs some new elastic in the waist.
sentences.cn: 这条裙子需要换一根松紧腰带。

trans.tran_en: the narrow part in the middle of the human body
